channel.title: Assistance required--Server connection!
channel.description: I have just completed the portforwarding section, Opened up No-Ip, checked hosts off, ran the Server, and I searched the website I was suppost to have set up via no-ip, and I searched my website, and every time I do, there is a connection Error, and I'm not even sure it works, could someone check out *, and tell me what they see, or provide a solution, as I have a feeling I'm missing a vital detail. Much appreciated for any input whatsoever (:.

item.title: Assistance required--Server connection!
item.dc:creator: @Tempest_Gaia Tempest Gaia
item.description:
@Tempest_Gaia wrote:

Well, thanks for the tip, but I feel there is something they did not put in the Tutorial, like maybe allowing a program through a firewall, or such. Is there anything specific I have to do, besides set up my port, and turn on DUC, and the server?

Read full topic

item.title: Assistance required--Server connection!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

If you feel you missed a vital detail then go back over the tutorial and check. Even create a check list if you must.

Read full topic
